snippet: The Hyundai Veloster may look predatory, but its glam style cannot compensate for middling performance or value.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of 2013 Hyundai Veloster and Veloster Turbo.
lead_paragraph: The Hyundai Veloster may look predatory, but its glam style cannot compensate for middling performance or value.
